```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(MATSS)
library(drake)
```

## Read in the results

```{r load summary objects}
# define where the cache is located
db <- DBI::dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), here::here("output", "drake-cache.sqlite"))
cache <- storr::storr_dbi("datatable", "keystable", db)

results_dataset_summary <- readd(results_dataset_summary, cache = cache)
```

## Errors
Find datasets that threw errors and list them: 
```{r find error datasets, echo = F}

for (i in seq(results_dataset_summary)){
    if(!is.list(results_dataset_summary[[i]])) {
        print(names(results_dataset_summary)[i])
        print(results_dataset_summary[[i]])
        results_dataset_summary <- results_dataset_summary[-i]
    }
}
```

From here, choose aspects of results_dataset_summary to present in report.
